# REPLesentR: Presentations inside the R REPL

author: Sebastian Warnholz  
date: `r Sys.Date()`  
email: wahani@gmail.com  


# Features

- Tools to convert RMarkdown or plain text files into slide decks to be
  presented inside the REPL
- The Presentation Mode to navigate inside a presentation 
- Evaluate code on slides
- Integrate data visualisations using the fantastic 'txtplot' package
- Non-Features
    - Syntax highlighting on slides
    - Colours on slides



# Commands in Presentation Mode

- `n` -- next slide
- `p` -- previous slide
- `f` -- first slide
- `l` -- last slide
- `e` -- evaluate code on slide
- `ee` -- evaluate all code up to this slide 
- `h` -- see this list
- `q` -- quit Presentation Mode
